alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 20 at 4:13PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A TEXAS STATEWIDE CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE PRINCETON TEXAS POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR ZAINAB ALI, A 16 YEARS OLD ASIAN FEMALE. SHE IS 5 FEET 6 INCHES TALL, 130 POUNDS WITH BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. SHE WAS LAST SEEN WEARING BLACK LONG-SLEEVE SHIRT, BLACK PANTS, AND WHITE SHOES. THE POLICE ARE ALSO SEARCHING FOR UMAR ALI, A 5 YEAR OLD ASIAN MALE. HE IS 3 FEET 8 INCHES TALL, 130 POUNDS WITH BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. HE WAS LAST SEEN WEARING BLACK AND WHITE JACKET, DARK T-SHIRT, BLACK PANTS AND WHITE SHOES. THE POLICE ARE ALSO SEARCHING FOR AYESHA ALI, AN 8 YEAR OLD ASIAN FEMALE. SHE IS 3 FEET 10 INCHES TALL, 70 POUNDS, WITH BLACK HAIR, AND BROWN EYES LAST SEEN WEARING A BLACK JACKET, BLACK SHIRT, DARK PURPLE LEGGINGS, AND BLACK AND WHITE SHOES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR NAZIA ALI, A 37 YEARS OLD ASIAN FEMALE IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. SHE IS 5 FEET 5 INCHES TALL, 210 POUNDS, WITH BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES AND UNKNOWN CLOTHING. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A BLACK, 2017, MERCEDES-BENZ, G L C 300 S U V BEARING TX LICENSE PLATE NUMBER N B V 5 3 3 4. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN PRINCETON, TEXAS. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE PRINCETON POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 4 2 7 1 5 4 9 2.

area.areaDesc: Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger
